other_tests.findings: Multiple liver masses identified: Segment 2 mass measures 4.7 x 3.8 x 3.2 cm (previously 2.7 x 3.0 cm on CT), Segment 4B mass measures 4.4 x 4.6 x 4.0 cm (previously 4.1 x 3.3 cm on CT), Segment 7 mass measures 3.1 x 3.1 x 2.9 cm (previously 1.9 x 2.8 cm on CT). The main portal vein is patent with hepatopetal flow. There is no ascites. The Bile ducts show no intrahepatic biliary dilation. The CBD measures 4 mm.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Segment 2 mass increased from 2.7 x 3.0 cm to 4.7 x 3.8 x 3.2 cm, Segment 4B mass increased from 4.1 x 3.3 cm to 4.4 x 4.6 x 4.0 cm, and Segment 7 mass increased from 1.9 x 2.8 cm to 3.1 x 3.1 x 2.9 cm.
